title: Ep. #12 | RED VELVET, STRAY KIDS, and SHINHWA + Eric's thoughts on BTS' recent OSTs
description:
Wrapping up his extensive European tour, Eric joins us on another episode of Daebak Show. This week, Eric discusses RED VELVET’s “Zimzalabim”, STRAY KIDS' “Side Effects”, and SHINHWA's “Perfect Man” [Throwback!]. Eric talks about performing with Wendy, thanks Stray Kids for ?, and brings it back to the stone age of renting VHS tapes to watch K-Pop performances. He also dives into BTS' new OSTs and reads YOUR comments and reviews. As always, if you enjoyed this episode, make sure to subscribe (for free) and let us know your thoughts on the show itself by leaving us a comment, rating, and/or review on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, SoundCloud, YouTube, or wherever else you get your podcasts. You can connect with us on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook @daebakshow. Lastly, we have sent out our FIRST-EVER newsletter this week. You can register at www.daebakshow.com to join this exclusive mailing list giving you access to prizes, new episodes, special events, etc. You might want to join. Holla!
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

Wrapping up his extensive European tour, Eric joins us on another episode of Daebak Show. This week, Eric discusses RED VELVET’s “Zimzalabim”, STRAY KIDS' “Side Effects”, and SHINHWA's “Perfect Man” [Throwback!]. Eric talks about performing with Wendy, thanks Stray Kids for ?, and brings it back to the stone age of renting VHS tapes to watch K-Pop performances. He also dives into BTS' new OSTs and reads YOUR comments and reviews. As always, if you enjoyed this episode, make sure to subscribe (for free) and let us know your thoughts on the show itself by leaving us a comment, rating, and/or review on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, SoundCloud, YouTube, or wherever else you get your podcasts.
